addStrategyToDepositStakerVault(address,.details: This simply avoids the strategy accumulating tokens in the deposit pool.
addStrategyToDepositStakerVault(address,.notice: Registers a pool's strategy with the stakerVault of the pool where the strategy deposits.

params.depositStakerVault: StakerVault of the pool where the strategy deposits.
params.strategyPool: The pool of the strategy to register (avoids blacklisting other addresses).

advanceKeeperGaugeEpoch(address).notice: Advance the keeper gauge for a pool by on epoch.

params.pool: Pool for which the keeper gauge is advanced.

batchExecuteAmmTokenWeights(address[]).details: If this is called by the INFLATION_MANAGER role address, no time delay is enforced.
batchExecuteAmmTokenWeights(address[]).notice: Execute weight updates for a batch of AMM tokens.

params.tokens: AMM tokens to execute the weight updates for.

batchExecuteKeeperPoolWeights(address[]).notice: Execute weight updates for a batch of _keeperGauges.

params.pools: Pools to execute the keeper weight updates for.

batchExecuteLpPoolWeights(address[]).details: If this is called by the INFLATION_MANAGER role address, no time delay is enforced.
batchExecuteLpPoolWeights(address[]).notice: Execute weight updates for a batch of LpTokens.

params.lpTokens: LpTokens to execute the weight updates for.

batchPrepareAmmTokenWeights(address[],ui.details: Each entry in the tokens array corresponds to an entry in the weights array.
batchPrepareAmmTokenWeights(address[],ui.notice: Prepare update of a batch of AMM token weights (with time delay enforced).

params.tokens: AMM tokens to update the inflation weight for.
params.weights: New weights for the inflation for the AMM tokens.

batchPrepareKeeperPoolWeights(address[],.details: Each entry in the pools array corresponds to an entry in the weights array.
batchPrepareKeeperPoolWeights(address[],.notice: Prepare update of a batch of keeperGauge weights (with time delay enforced).

params.pools: Pools to update the keeper weight for.
params.weights: New weights for the keeper inflation for the pools.

batchPrepareLpPoolWeights(address[],uint.details: Each entry in the lpTokens array corresponds to an entry in the weights array.
batchPrepareLpPoolWeights(address[],uint.notice: Prepare update of a batch of LP token weights (with time delay enforced).

params.lpTokens: LpTokens to update the inflation weight for.
params.weights: New weights for the inflation for the LpTokens.

checkpointAllGauges().details: This is mostly used upon inflation rate updates.

deactivateWeightBasedKeeperDistribution(.details: This can only be done once, when the keeper inflation mechanism is altered.
deactivateWeightBasedKeeperDistribution(.notice: Deactivates the weight-based distribution of keeper inflation.

executeAmmTokenWeight(address).details: Needs to be called after the update was prepraed. Fails if called before time delay is met.
executeAmmTokenWeight(address).notice: Execute update of lp pool weight (with time delay enforced).

executeKeeperPoolWeight(address).details: Needs to be called after the update was prepraed. Fails if called before time delay is met.
executeKeeperPoolWeight(address).notice: Execute update of keeper pool weight (with time delay enforced).

params.pool: Pool to execute the keeper weight update for.

executeLpPoolWeight(address).details: Needs to be called after the update was prepared. Fails if called before time delay is met.
executeLpPoolWeight(address).notice: Execute update of lp pool weight (with time delay enforced).

isInflationWeightManager(address).notice: Check if an account is governance proxy.

prepareAmmTokenWeight(address,uint256).notice: Prepare an inflation weight update for an AMM token (with time delay enforced).

params.token: AMM token to update the weight for.

prepareKeeperPoolWeight(address,uint256).notice: Prepare update of a keeper pool weight (with time delay enforced).

params.newPoolWeight: New weight for the keeper inflation for the pool.
params.pool: Pool to update the keeper weight for.

prepareLpPoolWeight(address,uint256).notice: Prepare update of a lp pool weight (with time delay enforced).

params.lpToken: LP token to update the weight for.

setAmmGauge(address,address).notice: Sets the AmmGauge for a particular AMM token.

setKeeperGauge(address,address).details: Multiple pools can have the same KeeperGauge.
setKeeperGauge(address,address).notice: Sets the KeeperGauge for a pool.

params.pool: Address of pool to set the KeeperGauge for.
